title: Fall 2024 Lipstick Challenge, Day 2!
description: Happy Tuesday! For day 2 of the Fall 2024 Lipstick Challenge, I‚Äôm wearing an oldie but goodie ‚Äî NARS Dragon Girl, a cool-toned red lip crayon. html:
Happy Tuesday! For day 2 of the Fall 2024 Lipstick Challenge, I‚Äôm wearing an oldie but goodie ‚Äî NARS Dragon Girl, a cool-toned red lip crayon.

I‚Äôve got the old school version in the black packaging, RIP. NARS reformulated their lip crayon line into what they call the Powermattes, and you know, sometimes I wonder why brands don‚Äôt just leave well enough alone. Anywho, I like the color of the older version, which I think is slightly cooler and more magenta.

Two things before I head out! One, for some reason I always want to call this lipstick ‚ÄúDragon Roll,‚Äù like it‚Äôs a type of sushi, hahaha! The second is that if I look a little dazed and confused in these pictures (which I took right before heading into the office), it‚Äôs because my co-worker caught me taking selfies, and I was kinda embarrassed to be having a full-on photo shoot in my car so early in the morning. üôÇ

What lip color are you wearing today?

Have a most excellent Tuesday, my friend!

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen
